meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tommy Jordan Megan Griffiths Matt DeTura Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6003.

td.p: Tommy Jordan, a pastor from Sylvania, Arkansas
Megan Griffiths, a conservation technician from Omaha, Nebraska
Matt DeTura, a recent law school graduate from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $45,200)

tr.td: VOLCANOES
WE'RE CUCKOO
20th CENTURY WOMEN
MORE THAN ONE MEANING
SEEMS LIKE LONG AGO
ONLY YESTERDAY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 2010 stranded airline passengers learned that Eyjafjallajokull is a volcano in this country')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 2010 stranded airline passengers learned that Eyjafjallajokull is a volcano in this country
